pages.text: Perfect for a well timed take-down or betrayal, this evil enchantment gives a massive damage boost to backstab attacks made with a dagger, both melee and ranged. With this powerful spell, even the lowliest of dagger becomes a deadly weapon. Higher levels of this enchantment will inflict even greater amounts of damage.
Please take note that the author cannot be held responsible for the death of any friendships, pets, nations, or alliances caused by the use of this enchantment.
